data.expected_result: The popup displays showing the game's description.
data.short_description: Clicking on a game title in a user's status or in the Games/Library tabs that does not have a news feed will crash the app
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a user's status that is playing a game that does not have a news feed. (I used Portal 2, Clustertruck, and Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic) - Alternatively, find these games in the Games or Library tabs - Click the title of the game
